alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 5:41PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 645 PM MST... At 540 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, or 17 miles south of Gila Bend, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Maricopa County. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 89 and 104. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 10 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
